author: Mainnetz
title: MainnetZ LP/Token Locker
description: The MainnetZ LP/Token Locker provides a secure platform for liquidity providers in decentralized finance (DeFi). It allows users to lock their LP tokens, ensuring stability and incentivizing long-term participation, contributing to the sustainable growth of decentralized ecosystems.

author: Mainnetz
title: MainnetZ BulkSender
description: The BulkSender project allows users to send ERC20 standard tokens, NETZ Coin (Native Currency), and ERC721 NFTs in bulk transactions. It simplifies the process of sending these tokens to multiple wallets in a single transaction.

author: Mainnetz
title: Zodiac Swap
description: The future of DeFi and NFTs on web3 powered by Mainnetz. The first DEX and AMM on Mainnetz! Earn ZADI thorough yield farming and stake to earn more tokens!

author: Mainnetz
title: Netz Fi
description: Netz.finance provides you with the development service you need to build your idea on Mainnetz, From a simple token to a complex dApp, we have you covered.

author: Mainnetz
title: NetzPad
description: NetzPad is your go-to decentralized ticket to token creation and liftoff on MainnetZ! With NetzPad, you can easily conjure up your smart contracts and set your tokens free. Forget about the complexities of coding â€“ our platform ensures a smooth ride for developers itching to make their mark on MainnetZ. Let's turn your token dreams into reality, hassle-free!

author: Revoke
title: Revoke.cash
shortDescription: Revoke.cash comes in as a preventative tool to manage your token allowances and practice proper wallet hygiene. By regularly revoking active allowances you reduce the chances of becoming the victim of allowance exploits.
description: Revoke.cash comes in as a preventative tool to manage your token allowances and practice proper wallet hygiene. By regularly revoking active allowances you reduce the chances of becoming the victim of allowance exploits.
